about.title: About Us
description: We are the IEEE MET Student Branch Computer Society Chapter, a dedicated community of passionate students working under the umbrella of IEEE to push the boundaries of innovation and technology.
Our vision is to empower students to start their journey in technology, help them develop their skills, and prepare them to become leaders in their fields.
At CS, we believe in learning by doing — that’s why we organize workshops, events, and projects to ensure our members don’t just study technology, but practice it.

We aim to create a supportive environment where beginners can take their first steps, and experienced members can refine their expertise. Together, we strive to build a generation of professionals that we — and the community — can depend on.
